name: Banana Bread with Oat-Streusel Topping
author: jody1
summary: Delicious banana bread with a sweet and textured topping. Great for breakfast, dessert or gift.
ingredients: ¼ cup cold butter, cut into small pieces
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
To make the streusel topping, mix 1/4 cup of cut-up butter, 1/2 cup flour, brown sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, and oats in a bowl until crumbly
Cream the sugar and butter together in a bowl, and stir in the eggs
Add the bananas, buttermilk, and vanilla extract, and stir until the mixture is well blended
Beat in the flour, pumpkin pie spice, baking powder, cinnamon, and nuts
Scoop the batter into the prepared loaf pans
Sprinkle the top of each loaf with half the streusel topping
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes, until the loaves have risen and the topping is browned
Let the banana bread cool in the pans for 5 minutes before turning out onto a wire rack to finish cooling
